params.condition: The ClaimCondition struct defining the condition

params.expectedPenaltyBps: The expected penalty in basis points

returns._0: The ID of the active claim condition

params.conditionId: The ID of the claim condition to retrieve

returns.condition: The ClaimCondition struct for the specified ID

params.account: The address of the wallet to check
params.conditionId: The ID of the claim condition

returns._0: The deposit ID of the wallet for the specified condition

params.account: The address of the wallet to check
params.conditionId: The ID of the claim condition

returns._0: The number of tokens claimed by the wallet for the specified condition

params.conditions: An array of ClaimCondition structs defining the conditions

claimAndStake((uint256,address,uint256,u.notice: Claims tokens and stakes them in the staking contract

getActiveClaimConditionId().notice: Gets the ID of the currently active claim condition

getClaimConditionById(uint256).notice: Retrieves a specific claim condition by its ID

getDepositIdByWallet(address,uint256).notice: Gets the deposit ID of a specific wallet for a given condition

getSupplyClaimedByWallet(address,uint256.notice: Gets the amount of tokens claimed by a specific wallet for a given condition

setClaimConditions((address,uint40,uint4.notice: Sets the claim conditions for the drop
